    • Constructor Detail

      • HealthItem

        public HealthItem(java.lang.String name,
                  int effectStrength,
                  Player player)
        Constructor to set the name, effect strength, and which player inventory this item belongs to.
        Parameters:
        name: - the name of the item
        effectStrength: - positive or negative effect strength of the item, the stat to which this item will affect is defined in it's appropriate subclass.
        player: - the player whose inventory this item belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • useBattleCommand

        public void useBattleCommand(Hero hero,
                             Hero target)
                      throws MaximumStatException
        Uses the item on the given hero. Throws MaximumStatException in the event the item will make no difference to the Hero's health. This exception is handled by the controller which sends a message to the view to display the error message to the user. These items cannot increase a hero's health beyond their maximum.
        Specified by:
        useBattleCommand in class Item
        Parameters:
        Hero: - hero, the hero to use this item on
        Throws:
        MaximumStatException
